description: Join Zoe on an adventure in Haste.

v0.3.1.description:
First revision to the third major release of the Haste Archipelago

You will need to subscribe to and enable the [Mod](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3462307025) on Steam.

## Bugfixes
- Fixed the "Ability Purchases" location group being nonfunctional
- Fixed some overlapping location IDs
- Stopped shop/fragmentsanity regions from being created if they were going to be empty anyway (since their corresponding Event to unlock said region would never be created)

## Known Issues
- The in-game text hints for Captain's Upgrades don't update until their buttons are hovered over (except the upgrade for Max Lives, which *does* update immediately for some reason)
- When a shop has multiple AP Items, if you purchase the left-most AP Item first, the rightmost AP is purchased at the leftmost's price
- The in-game notification for important items doesn't like appearing in shops and also is deleted upon loading the end-of-fragment rank screen (which is really annoying for fragmentsanity checks)

v0.3.2.description:
Second revision to the third major release of the Haste Archipelago

You will need to subscribe to and enable the [Mod](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3462307025) on Steam.

## Bugfixes
- Fixed issue where a lower Shard Goal could cause fill issues when trying to create locations for the Weeboh and Flopsy costume purchases
- Added conditions within generate_early to preemptively stop seeds that would be too restrictive to generate consistently or generate at all
- Fixed internal issue where the Menu region was added twice
- Fixed some numeral regions still being created unnecessarily even after I asked them not to last update

## Known Issues
- The in-game text hints for Captain's Upgrades don't update until their buttons are hovered over (except the upgrade for Max Lives, which *does* update immediately for some reason)
- When a shop has multiple AP Items, if you purchase the left-most AP Item first, the rightmost AP is purchased at the leftmost's price
- The in-game notification for important items doesn't like appearing in shops and also is deleted upon loading the end-of-fragment rank screen (which is really annoying for Fragmentsanity checks)

v0.4.0.description:
The fourth major release of the Haste Archipelago

You will need to subscribe to and enable the [Mod](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3462307025) on Steam.

## New YAML Features
- **Starting Ability** allows you to choose one of the 4 abilities to start with... or start with no ability at all!
- **Persistent Items** will add items that will be granted to you at the start of a Shard
  - Each item is broken down by rarity and category, and a new item *from your unlocked items* is selected on each Shard
  - The quantity of each rarity/category combination can be set independently
  - The item categories can be found [here](https://github.com/WritingHusky/haste_apworld/blob/main/docs/ItemCategories.md)
- *We got traps now*. They will apply at the start of the next Fragment, and last until either the Fragment is cleared or you die, whichever happens first
  - **Disaster Traps** will activate the Level 1 effects (lava flowers & health loss when slow)
  - **Landing Downgrade Traps** will downgrade any landing you make (Perfect -> Good, Good -> Ok, Ok -> Bad)
- **Extra Shards** will add extra Progressive Shards to the pool to add a buffer to any Shard Goal setting
  - **Remove Post-Victory Locations** has been changed to now *only* give you enough Progressive Shards to access you goal, instead of there always being 9 of them

## Bugfixes
- Added a comical amount of version checks to prevent future issues where old savedata caused new seeds to bug out
- Added last-resort console commands to help unstuck bugged Shop/Fragmentsanity data
  - The list of console commands can be found [here](https://github.com/WritingHusky/haste_apworld/blob/main/docs/ConsoleCommands.md)
- Fixed issues where attempting to load a new save wouldn't kill any existing connections if they somehow weren't closed prior (Final Machine)
- Fixed various issues regarding the unlock and logic conditions with the Flopsy and Weeboh costumes
- Fixed issue where the default costumes would not be unlocked under certain circumstances
- Fixed issue where the Shard 1 location group also included Shard 10
- Fixed the vanilla bug where a shop with duplicate items will let you buy the rightmost item at the leftmost's price
- Fixed visual issues with the Item notification and Captain purchases caused by the Haste 1.8.0 update
- Fixed issue where Force Reloading from some NPC conversations softlocked the player
- Fixed issue where starting_inventory could cause desyncs with the internal ExpectedIndex, resulting in duplicate items
- Fixed issue where the Max Lives item wouldn't actually grant an extra life (because it's coded weirdly in vanilla)
- Changed the default hostname to `archipelago.gg` instead of localhost
